about_the_game:
Of the Lilies is a visual novel adventure game with an otome-style narrative set in a fantasy colonial world in the 1880s that tells a story of love and loss.

As the chieftain-to-be in the small village of Tayabac, your family was counting on you to lead the tribe and take care of your people. But when your hometown is invaded, you’re left without a home, without a culture, and without a family.

10 years later, when the curses that only come once in a hundred years suddenly resurface, you are faced with a choice that forces you to decide on the path you’re willing to take to come to terms with your past. Is it worth a single sacrifice?

Features

Shape Your Identity

Your choices determine how your story ends. Choose based on what you believe is right as you confront your past and resolve your inner conflict. Will you seek vengeance against those who took your family away from you? Do you strive for justice, working to restore balance? Or will you pursue peace and let go of the past that’s holding you down?

Choose a Sacrifice

Of The Lilies features 5 love interests, each with their own views and personal stories. Get to know the characters and form bonds that may last or falter in the face of conflict, with 15+ possible endings.

Explore the World of Ambana

Immerse yourself in a fantasy world inspired by Southeast Asian culture and history. Discover more about the stories behind the people and explore the rich lore that shaped the society you live in.

content_descriptors.notes: Fantasy violence in a colonial setting
